name: Roberto Salgado
summary: I'm a colombian Engineering/CS graduate in his 20s who tries to craft good code and sometimes makes it. I do software development, mostly web development, and have interest in Computer Science, some Tech and Engineering related areas.
In my spare time I like listening to music, playing PC games, watching some TV series and movies, reading, and also, learning about whatever I find interesting.

education.description: Undergraduate degree in Systems Engineering (Ingeniería de Sistemas) - Colombia's equivalent of Computer Science/Engineering.
Various online courses on different topics like Algorithms & Data Structures, Machine Learning, Learning Techniques and Critical Thinking.

experience.description: Software Developer. Mostly working with .NET and Oracle technologies at different levels of the stack, working in small projects to add features and make changes to large web application.
Internship at IT department. Procedures documentation and some internal Android development.
